thread.section_title: Independent Carpet One Westland Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Independent Carpet One Westland | www.independentcarpetonewestland.com
thread.title: Scott Canfield
thread.title_full: Independent Carpet One Westland reviewed by Scott Canfield

author: Scott Canfield
title: Scott Canfield
text:
I used to be a commercial flooring installer (retired) and these guys are the best!
Bob is trustworthy and treats everyone like family. All the sales staff are patient and do not put pressure on you to buy. I have sent family and friends here for years as well as use them for my personal and rental home needs. Give them a try and you won't go anywhere else.
